The material feels soft and comfortable against the skin, making it perfect for all-day wear. The fit is flattering, offering a sleek silhouette that can be dressed up or down. Whether paired with jeans for a casual look or a skirt for a more polished outfit, this vest top is versatile and stylish. A chic addition to any wardrobe. I'll be buying in other colors.
